parameters.name: vehicleName
parameters.description: The ID of the vehicle to retrieve information about.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the vehicle to retrieve information about.

nested_items.name: modelManifestArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of a vehicle model (model manifest) associated with the vehicle.

nested_items.name: decoderManifestArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of a decoder manifest associated with the vehicle.

nested_items.name: attributes
nested_items.description: Static information about a vehicle in a key-value pair. For example:

nested_items.name: stateTemplates
nested_items.description: State templates associated with the vehicle.

nested_items.name: identifier
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the state template.

nested_items.name: stateTemplateUpdateStrategy
nested_items.description: The update strategy for the state template. Vehicles associated with the state template can stream telemetry data with either an onChange or periodic update strategy.

nested_items.name: stateTemplateUpdateRate
nested_items.description: The length of time between state template updates.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time the vehicle was created in seconds since epoch (January 1, 1970 at midnight UTC time).

nested_items.name: lastModificationTime
nested_items.description: The time the vehicle was last updated in seconds since epoch (January 1, 1970 at midnight UTC time).
